page.description: Appends arguments to an argument object from a JSON argument definition
page.syntax: argumentsFromJSON(args as SQL::Arguments, json as C)

argument.name: args
argument.description: SQL::Arguments object to which the arguments will be added.

argument.name: json
argument.description: The JSON Object containing the data to append to the SQL::Arguments args object.

page.example:
dim json as c = "[{name: 'firstname',value: 'John',type: 'C'},{name: 'lastname',value: 'Smith',type: 'C'}]" dim args as SQL::Arguments
argumentsfromjson(args,json)
? args.XML = <SQLArguments> <SQLArgument> <Name>firstname</Name> <Data Type="C">John</Data> <IsNull Type="L">0</IsNull> <Usage>Input</Usage> </SQLArgument> <SQLArgument> <Name>lastname</Name> <Data Type="C">Smith</Data> <IsNull Type="L">0</IsNull> <Usage>Input</Usage> </SQLArgument> </SQLArguments>
